precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the taskbar.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is visible and the mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Control Panel' option.
action: Click the 'Control Panel' menu item in the Start Menu.
expected_results: The 'Control Panel' option's tooltip will disappear.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Category view.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" category will open.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open within the Windows XP Control Panel.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will switch to the "Screen Saver" tab. The preview area will display a monitor icon with a sample window against a blue background.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the down arrow on the "Screen saver" drop-down list.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear in a drop-down menu.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "3D FlowerBox" option within the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "3D FlowerBox" option will be selected in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu and the "Settings" button will become active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power" button at the bottom of the window is visible.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme will be selected by default.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off monitor:"
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected. The "System hibernates:" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates:" dropdown menu will close. The "Never" option will be displayed, indicating that the system will not hibernate automatically for the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Save As" dialog box will open, allowing you to enter a name for the new power scheme and choose a save location.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Minimal Power Management" item in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will close. The "Settings for 'Minimal Power Management' power scheme" section will update to reflect the selected scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off hard disks" under the "Settings for 'Always On' power scheme" section.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with various time options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "Always On" power scheme is selected. The "Settings for Always On power scheme" section is visible.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off monitor" under the "Settings for Always On power scheme" section.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with different time options for the monitor to turn off will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected. The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu is open under the 'Settings for 'Always On' power scheme' section.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu will close. The selected option for 'System hibernates' will be 'Never'.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Cancel' button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close without saving any changes. The previous settings will remain in effect.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu displays "[None]".
The "Appearance and Themes" window is open in the Control Panel.
action: Click the close button in the top right corner of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close, and the Control Panel window will become active.
